message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have a smaller share, but I'll give you a decent amount. Don't be greedy!
You're trying to lowball me? I'll give you a chance to reconsider!
You're trying to take advantage of the inflation, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Don't think you can cheat me!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off easy!
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just being realistic. You're not getting the better deal, I am.
